photoURL.description: URL of the user's profile picture.

IncidentResponse.title: Incident Response
IncidentResponse.description: An automated response to a detected security incident.

eventId.description: The ID of the threat event that triggered this response.

threatType.description: The type of threat detected (e.g., 'Port Scan', 'Phishing').

severity.description: The assessed severity of the threat.

recommendedAction.description: The simulated action taken in response to the threat.

simulatedResult.description: A description of the outcome of the simulated action.

timestamp.description: The timestamp of when the response was generated.

/incident_responses/{responseId}.description: Stores records of automated incident responses.
